message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $80 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $110.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $110. How about we meet in the middle at $95?
Hi Bob, I understand that $95 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to compromise. I can sell it to you for $105.
I'm still not convinced that $105 is the best price for this product. I'm willing to go up to $85, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
Hi Bob, I understand that you're still trying to negotiate, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to make one more offer, and that's $100. This is my final offer.
